item.title: 国际货币基金组织警告通货紧缩放缓可能导致 "更长时间 "的高利率
item.description: 国际货币基金组织警告说，许多主要经济体的通胀降温速度慢于预期，这给全球经济增长带来了利率 "更长时间 "保持较高水平的潜在风险。【原文：The International Monetary Fund warned inflation in many major economies has been cooling slower than expected, raising a potential risk to global growth from interest rates staying higher “for even longer.”】

item.title: 塔塔控股的印度航空公司六月份市场份额在合并前上升
item.description: 印度航空公司（Air India Ltd.）6月份的本地市场份额升至三年来的最高点，这对塔塔集团（Tata Group）旗下的这家印度航空公司来说是个好消息，该公司正在与另一家航空公司合并，以精简业务并吸引更多乘客。【原文：Air India Ltd.’s local market share in June rose to its highest in three years, in a boost for the Tata Group-owned Indian carrier that’s combining with another airline to streamline operations and lure more fliers.】

item.title: 花旗集团北美杠杆贷款部招聘四名员工
item.description: 花旗集团（Citigroup Inc. 聘请了四名员工，以扩大其在北美的杠杆信贷销售和交易团队。【原文：Citigroup Inc. hired four people to expand its leveraged-credit sales and trading team in North America.】

item.title: 约克维尔交易可能加剧股份稀释，特朗普传媒股价下滑
item.description: 作为与 Yorkville Advisors 达成的融资协议的一部分，该公司注册了 3,800 万股股票，在此之后，支持唐纳德-特朗普的媒体初创公司的投资者所持股份可能会被稀释。【原文：Investors backing Donald Trump’s media startup may see their stake diluted after the company registered 38 million shares as part of a financing pact with Yorkville Advisors.】

item.title: 据说阿达尼和威尔玛将考虑出售合资公司 6.7 亿美元的股份
item.description: 印度亿万富翁高塔姆-阿达尼（Gautam Adani）和威尔玛国际有限公司（Wilmar International Ltd.）正在与银行进行早期谈判，以出售其消费合资企业阿达尼-威尔玛有限公司（Adani Wilmar Ltd.）的少数股份，熟悉此事的人士称，这有助于该公司遵守持股规定。【原文：Indian billionaire Gautam Adani and Wilmar International Ltd. are in early talks with banks to sell a minority stake in their consumer joint venture Adani Wilmar Ltd., people familiar with the matter said, helping the company abide by shareholding regulations.】

item.title: 印度证券交易委员会考虑为散户投资者提供类似对冲基金的产品
item.description: 印度资本市场监管部门正在提议允许资产管理公司为普通投资者提供类似对冲基金的产品，以加大力度遏制未经授权的投资产品的泛滥。【原文：India’s capital market regulator is proposing allowing asset management companies to offer hedge fund-like products for mom-and-pop investors as it steps up efforts to curb proliferation of unauthorized investment products.】

item.title: 橡树山、OneIM 达成 50 亿美元私人信贷合作协议
item.description: 私人信贷公司橡树山顾问公司（Oak Hill Advisors）和 One 投资管理公司（One Investment Management）正在联手合作，这是基金管理公司希望在 1.7 万亿美元的市场中套现的最新合作。【原文：Private credit firms Oak Hill Advisors and One Investment Management are joining forces in the latest tie-up between fund managers looking to cash in on the $1.7 trillion market.】

item.title: 法国顶级足球联赛与 Dazn 和 BeIN 达成转播协议
item.description: 法国精英职业足球联赛的大多数成员投票赞成与 Len Blavatnik 的流媒体集团 Dazn Group Ltd. 和卡塔尔体育广播公司 beIN 签订转播协议，播放新赛季的现场比赛。【原文：The majority of France’s elite professional football league voted for a broadcast deal with Len Blavatnik’s streaming group Dazn Group Ltd. and the Qatari sports broadcaster beIN to screen live matches of the new season.】

item.title: 瑞士奢侈钟表市场遭遇由中国主导的残酷衰退
item.description: 由于紧张的消费者重新考虑在昂贵钟表上挥金如土，以及该行业主要市场之一的需求下滑，瑞士制造的奢侈钟表销售急剧萎缩。【原文：Sales of Swiss-made luxury watches are in sharp retreat as nervous consumers reconsider splashing out on expensive timepieces and demand slumps in one of the industry’s key markets.】

item.title: 英国两年期债券收益率今年首次跌至 4% 以下
item.description: 英国国债反弹，使两年期国债收益率今年首次跌破 4%，因为投资者押注随着通胀放缓，英国央行将很快开始放宽货币政策。【原文：UK government debt rallied, driving the two-year yield below 4% for the first time this year, as investors bet the Bank of England will soon start easing monetary policy as inflation slows.】

item.title: 维珍航空撤出中国，取消希思罗机场至上海航线
item.description: 维珍大西洋航空公司（Virgin Atlantic Airways Ltd.）将从 10 月起暂停伦敦希思罗机场和上海之间的航班，放弃其运营的唯一一条通往中国的航线，原因是避开俄罗斯领空的成本很高。【原文：Virgin Atlantic Airways Ltd. is suspending flights between London Heathrow and Shanghai from October, abandoning the only route it operates to China because of the high cost associated with avoiding Russian air space.】

item.title: 如果欧盟保证需求，土耳其可增加对欧盟的天然气出口
item.description: 土耳其准备向欧盟出售更多天然气，但希望获得长期承诺，以证明所需的基础设施投资是合理的。土耳其还希望避开欧盟为避免俄罗斯天然气而推动的任何复杂的交换。【原文：Turkey is ready to sell more natural gas to the European Union but wants long-term commitments to justify the infrastructure investment needed. item.title: 日本旨在提高航空燃油产量和进口量以缓解燃油紧张状况
item.description: 日本计划增加喷气机燃油的生产和进口，以缓解阻碍外国航空公司在该国运营的持续短缺问题。【原文：Japan plans to increase the production and import of jet fuel in an effort to ease an ongoing shortage that has hampered foreign airlines’ operations in the country.】

item.title: 油轮在阿曼杜克姆港附近倾覆
item.description: 阿曼海事安全中心在社交媒体平台 X 上发布消息称，一艘悬挂科摩罗国旗的油轮在阿曼杜克姆港附近的拉斯马德拉卡东南 25 海里处倾覆。【原文：A Comoros-flagged oil products tanker capsized 25 nautical miles southeast of Ras Madrakah near the Omani port of Duqm, the country’s Maritime Security Centre said in a post on social media platform X.】

item.title: 即使成本问题持续存在，UnitedHealth 盈利仍超出预期
item.description: 联合健康集团公司（UnitedHealth Group Inc.【原文：UnitedHealth Group Inc. reported second-quarter results that surpassed Wall Street’s expectations even as a key measure of the insurer’s medical costs was higher than anticipated.】

item.title: 淡马锡在印度的重点将是少数股权和增长投资
item.description: 淡马锡控股私人有限公司（Temasek Holdings Pte）的目标是持有少数股权，并帮助印度公司在此基础上发展壮大，在很大程度上摒弃了持有世界上人口最多国家公司多数股权的趋势。【原文：Temasek Holdings Pte is targeting minority stakes and helping Indian companies to grow from there, largely eschewing the trend of taking majority holdings in firms based in the world’s most populous country.】

item.title: 模拟灾难的基金经理不断赢得赌注
item.description: 上个月，有报道称飓风贝里尔将成为历史上最早的五级飓风，一群基金经理正忙于弄清楚他们以自然灾害为中心的高度校准的赌注是否会受到重大打击。【原文：Last month, amid reports that Hurricane Beryl would become the earliest Category 5 hurricane in history, a group of money managers were busy trying to figure out whether their highly calibrated bets centered on natural catastrophes were about to take a major hit.】

item.title: 与阿波罗和 KKR 有关联的保险公司在新的转折中直接购买抵押贷款
item.description: 渴求收益率的保险公司正在采取一种非常规策略：他们跳过抵押贷款支持债券，直接购买相关的整笔贷款。【原文：Yield-hungry insurance firms are adopting an unconventional strategy: they’re skipping mortgage-backed bonds and buying the underlying whole loans outright.】

item.title: 战神接近达成香港大厦贷款股权交易
item.description: Ares Management Corp.收购香港豪华公寓开发项目 The Corniche 的 102 亿港元（13 亿美元）项目贷款多数股权的交易已进入最后阶段。【原文：Ares Management Corp. is in the final stages of a deal to buy a majority stake in the HK$10.2 billion ($1.3 billion) project loan backing luxury apartment development The Corniche in Hong Kong.】

item.title: Citadel 聘请 Segantii 的 Pidgeon 担任亚太区财务主管
item.description: 两位知情人士透露，肯-格里芬（Ken Griffin）的 Citadel 对冲基金公司正在挖角 Segantii Capital Management Ltd. 公司的一位高级职员来领导其亚太区财务团队。【原文：Ken Griffin’s Citadel hedge fund business is tapping a senior Segantii Capital Management Ltd. staffer to head its Asia-Pacific treasury team, said two people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 全球股票投资者寻求抵押品，印度债券受追捧
item.description: 印度的主权债券市场正吸引着外国股票投资者，他们将这些证券作为交易保证金要求的抵押品。【原文：India’s sovereign bond market is attracting foreign equity investors, who are using the securities as collateral for trade margin requirements.】

item.title: 日本周五可能花费 135 亿美元干预日元汇率
item.description: 彭博社（Bloomberg）对日本央行经常账户的分析表明，日本很可能在周五连续第二天进入货币市场。【原文：Japan likely stepped into the currency market for a second straight day on Friday, a Bloomberg analysis of the central bank’s current account indicates.】

item.title: 更名后的 Yandex 计划回购股票，聚焦人工智能新领域
item.description: Nebius 集团是最近重新命名的 Yandex NV 公司，该公司刚刚出售了俄罗斯业务，正在计划回购股票，因为这家技术公司正在重建，目标是成为欧洲最大的商业人工智能基础设施提供商。【原文：Nebius Group, the recently re-named Yandex NV that’s fresh off the sale of its Russian business, is planning a share buyback as the technology company rebuilds with an aim of becoming the largest commercial artificial intelligence infrastructure provider in Europe.】

item.title: 马拉松资产管理公司首席执行官看到了房地产的 "惊人 "机遇
item.description: 马拉松资产管理公司（Marathon Asset Management）首席执行官布鲁斯-理查兹（Bruce Richards）表示，数万亿美元的问题商业地产将在未来两三年内解决，这将为投资者创造 "惊人的机会"。【原文：Trillions of dollars of problematic commercial real estate will have to be worked out over the next two to three years, creating an “amazing amount of opportunity” for investors, according to Marathon Asset Management Chief Executive Officer Bruce Richards.】

item.title: 德国投资者信心一年来首次下滑
item.description: 由于工业未能配合其他行业的逐步复苏，投资者对德国经济的信心一年来首次下降。【原文：Investor confidence in Germany’s economy worsened for the first time in a year as industry fails to match a gradual recovery in other sectors.】
